subject: Re: [junit] Execution Order
msgSnippet: ... So am I second on the chopping block for not being rude and interrupting the conversation to introduce you to my wife? :) -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger ::
messageBody:
Kent Beck wrote:

> First you execute everyone who is mean or deliberately annoying. Then you
> execute everyone with no social skills of any kind. Then ....
> Oops, you meant "test execution". Sorry :-)

So am I second on the chopping block for not being rude and interrupting
the conversation to introduce you to my wife? :)
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca

2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
